product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.tagline: Brighten Up with Vitamin C Power
product.headline: Unlock Radiant Skin with 10% Vitamin C GlowBoost Serum
product.description: Unlock a radiant glow with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, expertly formulated with 10% Vitamin C to brighten and even out your complexion. This potent serum also fades dark spots, revealing a smoother, more luminous you. Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, GlowBoost provides long-lasting hydration while tackling hyperpigmentation, making it perfect for oily and combination skin types. By harnessing the power of Vitamin C, GlowBoost delivers a visibly brighter, more even-toned complexion that glows from within.

ingredient_details.name: Vitamin C
ingredient_details.description: A powerful antioxidant that helps to brighten and even out skin tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while protecting the skin from environmental stressors.

ingredient_details.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredient_details.description: A natural humectant that retains moisture in the skin, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving the skin feeling soft, smooth, and supple.

detailed_benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to even out your skin tone, giving you a brighter and more radiant complexion by reducing the appearance of dullness and hyperpigmentation.
The serum effectively fades dark spots and acne scars, leaving your skin with a more uniform tone and a smoother texture, resulting in a more flawless and youthful appearance.

how_to_use.raw_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
how_to_use.summary: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning
Gently massage the serum into your skin until it is fully absorbed
tips: Apply before sunscreen for optimal results
Avoid applying to broken or irritated skin

precautions: Mild tingling may occur on sensitive skin, reduce frequency of use if this occurs
who_should_avoid: Sensitive skin types, except for those with oily or combination skin who may tolerate the product with caution
expanded_safety.storage: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and out of reach of children
